com.gotenna.sdk.utils

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gotenna.sdk.utils.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic Utility methods used in the SDK. Created on 3/20/15.

        BAs64 decodes a string.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • safeCopyOfRange

        public static byte[] safeCopyOfRange(byte[] original,
                     int start,
                     int end)
        Copies elements from original into a new array, from indexes start (inclusive) to end (exclusive). The original order of elements is preserved. Uses Arrays.copyOfRange(byte[], int, int) to accomplish this, if an invalid start/end index is passed in, and empty byte array will be returned instead of an exception being thrown.
        Parameters:
        original - The original array.
        start - The start index, inclusive.
        end - The end index, exclusive.
        Returns:
        The new array.

      • safeSubData

        public static byte[] safeSubData(byte[] original,
                 int startIndex,
                 int length)
        Extracts a sub array from the original array based on the startIndex and length. Uses safeCopyOfRange(byte[], int, int) to accomplish this, if an invalid start index or length is passed in, and empty byte array will be returned instead of an exception being thrown.
        Parameters:
        original - The original array.
        startIndex - The start index, inclusive.
        length - The length of the sub array
        Returns:
        The new sub array.

      • sendLocalBroadcast

        public static void sendLocalBroadcast(android.content.Context context,
                      java.lang.String eventName)
        Sends a local broadcast using LocalBroadcastManager
        Parameters:
        context - The context.
        eventName - The action to be used in the intent for the broadcast.

      • registerForLocalBroadcast

        public static void registerForLocalBroadcast(android.content.Context context,
                             android.content.BroadcastReceiver messageReceiver,
                             java.lang.String eventName)
        Registers a broadcast receiver using LocalBroadcastManager
        Parameters:
        context - The context.
        messageReceiver - The BroadcastReceiver to receive the actions.
        eventName - The action to be used in the IntentFilter

                               android.content.BroadcastReceiver messageReceiver)
        Unregisters a broadcast receiver using LocalBroadcastManager
        Parameters:

        messageReceiver - The BroadcastReceiver to unregister.

      • containsSameData

        public static boolean containsSameData(byte[] arrayA,
                       byte[] arrayB)
        Determines if two byte arrays contain the same exact data.
        Parameters:
        arrayA - Byte array to check.
        arrayB - Byte array to check.
        Returns:
        True if the two byte arrays contain the same exact data, false otherwise.

      • bytesToHexString

        public static java.lang.String bytesToHexString(byte[] bytes)
        Converts an array of bytes into their hexadecimal string representation. Can be used alongside hexStringToByteArray(String).
        Parameters:
        bytes - The array of bytes to convert into a hexadecimal string.
        Returns:
        The hexadecimal string representation of the byte array.

      • hexStringToByteArray

        public static byte[] hexStringToByteArray(java.lang.String string)
        Converts a hexadecimal string into it's byte[] equivalent. Can be used alongside bytesToHexString(byte[]).
        Parameters:
        string - The hexadecimal string to convert to bytes.
        Returns:
        The converted bytes.

      • splitDataIntoChunks

        public static byte[][] splitDataIntoChunks(byte[] data,
                           int maxDataSize)
        Splits a byte array into multiple byte arrays based on the maxDataSize. i.e.) A byte array of 10 bytes, with a maxDataSize of 5 will be split into two byte arrays that contains 5 bytes each. Preserves the original order of the bytes.
        Parameters:
        data - The byte array to split into chunks.
        maxDataSize - How many bytes per array there should be.
        Returns:
        An array or byte array split appropriately.

      • isUIThread

        public static boolean isUIThread()
        Checks to see if the thread that this method is run in, is the UI thread.
        Returns:
        True if method was run on the UI thread, false otherwise.
